original_text: They have thrown the gods of these nations into the fire. Those idols are not really gods. People used wood and stone to make them. So the Assyrians could destroy them.
korean_text: 또 그들의 신들을 불에 던졌사오니 이는 그들이 신이 아니요 사람의 손으로 만든 것 곧 나무와 돌 뿐이므로 멸하였나이다

sentences.original_text: They have thrown the gods of these nations
Those idols are not really gods
People used wood and stone to make them
So the Assyrians could destroy them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 아시리아 사람들이 그것들을 파괴할 수 있었습니다
